Gem使用常见问题

03 May 2013, by Free

全文搜索Sunspot 出现 RSolr::Error::Http - 500 Internal Server Error 解决方法:

log:

RSolr::Error::Http - 500 Internal Server Error
Error: Severe errors in solr configuration.

Check your log files for more detailed information on what may be wrong.

If you want solr to continue after configuration errors, change:

<abortOnConfigurationError>false</abortOnConfigurationError>

in null

The solution:

  • rake sunspot:solr:stop
  • Delete your /solr directory.
  • rake sunspot:solr:start
  • rake sunspot:solr:reindex

使用rvm安装gem出现权限错误

  • 1. 命令 gem install sqlite3 错误：ERROR: While executing gem ... (Errno::EACCES) Permission denied - /Users/free/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p327/cache/sqlite3-1.3.6.gem

解决方法：chown -R free ~/.rvm，然后再安装，sudo gem install sqlite3。
